title: ExcelMEDIAN Function

metadata.description: Learn about ExcelMEDIAN Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title:
Excel
MEDIAN Function

MEDIAN Function
The
MEDIAN
function is a premade function in Excel
content_sections.content: , which returns the middle value in the data.

content_sections.title: It is typed
content_sections.content:
=MEDIAN
Note:
The median is a type of average value, which describes where the center of the data is located. You can learn about median in our
Statistics Median Tutorial
.
Calculating the median manually requires that the data is sorted and arranged from low to high. This is not necessary using the MEDIAN function, it does it for you.

content_sections.title: How to use the
Type
content_sections.content:
=MEDIAN
Double click the
MEDIAN
command
Select a range (
A2:G2
)
Hit enter
Great!

content_sections.title: You successfully found the median using the
content_sections.content:
=MEDIAN
function.
Note that it found the value in the middle of the data, which is
D2(2)
, the one that is marked red:

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers ExcelMEDIAN Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use ExcelMEDIAN Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of ExcelMEDIAN Function and how to apply it in your projects.
